skillTree.localised_description: Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

skillTree.localised_description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fly.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
"They aren't much different in death than life, they still smell and moan quite often..."
"I once felt the harmony of the spirits around me, now all I hear is their torment. I will sharpen that torment and direct it at our enemies."

effects.description:
Armour: +15 for Shuimu and Ethereal units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +6 for Shuimu and Ethereal units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: "The false dragons no longer hold sway over my soul, I have given it to our blood sire, witness my dark ascension and despair."
"Property of the Esoteric Cabal of Alchemists, the Sanctum of Metal Athenaeum, -Shang-Yang"
"Property of the Grand Order of Astromancy, Grand Celestial Headquarters Librarium, -Wei Jin"
The combination of Dragon and Vampire blood has turned the Jade-Blooded Shugengan into a horrible blend of powerful creatures, together their regenerative abilities are volatile.

ui_effects.localised_text: Chance of unit gaining hit points

skillTree.localised_description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The body of a Vampire looks human, but is capable of reactions so fast that even the quickest swordsman would look clumsy in comparison.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Witnessing other friendly units rout will only affect this unit's leadership if they also have the Contempt attribute.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
